word:
There are those over whom the control of Satan seems for a time to be broken; through the grace of God they are set free from the evil spirit that has held dominion over the soul. But they do not surrender themselves to God daily, that Christ might dwell in the heart; and when the evil spirit returns with 


                                  -314- 

"seven other spirits more wicked than himself," he is wholly dominated by the power of evil.
